_header: And since something is sad here
Subjects: Paul, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St Paul, in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
Ande sene sum thinge is sad hereof paule þat was peteris
                    fere…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& helpyne to all warldly manin hewyry tyme say we
                    amen
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.15-31.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.29-62.
